Literature.Title: The Bogorol family of antibiotics: template-based structure elucidation and a new approach to positioning enantiomeric pairs of amino acids.
Literature.Author: Barsby T, Warabi K, Sørensen D, Zimmerman WT, Kelly MT, Andersen RJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=4.5µg/ml),Enterococcus sp.(MIC=18µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>200µg/ml),Burkholderia cepacia(MIC=>200µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=>200µg/ml)
